product_overview: MechaStream AI Platform is an integrated development and AI chatbot platform that combines real-time AI chat interfaces, an AI-assisted code IDE, and deployment management for developers and AI enthusiasts. It supports multi-provider AI APIs and real-time code execution and preview capabilities, designed for seamless coding, debugging, and AI interaction.
core_goals: Provide a seamless AI chatbot experience with real-time messaging and code generation capabilities.
Deliver an integrated development environment with live code editing, terminal simulation, and AI assistance.
Support multiple AI API providers with fallback mechanisms to ensure high availability.
Enable real-time preview and deployment of applications generated or managed within the platform.
Offer robust navigation and UI customization to enhance user experience.
Provide detailed analytics, error handling, and monitoring dashboards for operational visibility.
key_features: MechaStream Chat Interface facilitating real-time AI conversational interactions including code generation and file attachments.
Fully integrated Code IDE with a Monaco Editor based code editor, terminal simulation supporting multiple languages, and AI assistant integration.
Robust AI API integration with fallback support from providers including Groq, OpenAI, Google, and Ollama.
Multiple chat interfaces including ChatGPT style and enhanced Vibe Chat with animations for user choice.
Real-time Live Preview Builder to instantly view generated application code output.
Deployment Manager module for handling app deployment and hosting directly from the platform.
Advanced Features and Analytics Dashboards for managing AI capabilities and reviewing application performance metrics.
Comprehensive AI Settings and API Settings dashboards for configuration of AI provider credentials and preferences.
Real-time API Status Indicator providing ongoing monitoring of AI service availability.
Web Search feature integrated to retrieve real-time web information within chats.
Theme Customizer for UI styling and personalization.
A library of pre-built Code Templates and snippets to speed up development.
user_flow_summary: Users land on the Homepage featuring an overview and integrated chatbot for quick interaction.
Users navigate via the Navigation System to access the IDE, Deployment Manager, Dashboards, and Settings.
Within the IDE, users write code in the Monaco Editor, execute it via the WebContainer Terminal, and interact with the AI Assistant for help and code generation.
Users can switch between different chat interfaces (MechaStream Chat, ChatGPT Style, and Vibe Chat) based on preference.
Users preview their work with the Live Preview Builder, deploy applications via the Deployment Manager, and monitor usage metrics with Analytics Dashboard.
Users manage AI provider configurations and monitor API statuses through dedicated settings and status components.
The platform provides error handling and real-time feedback through the Error Display and Toast notifications throughout workflows.
validation_criteria: Real-time chat interfaces must deliver messages with minimal latency and support file attachments reliably.
Code IDE must provide syntax highlighting, error detection, and terminal outputs accurately for supported languages.
Fallback between AI API providers works seamlessly without user disruption during outages.
Live Preview updates reflect code changes instantly and deployment actions are logged and successful.
Navigation and UI customization settings persist across sessions and devices.
Dashboards must display accurate and up-to-date analytics and error data.
All API configuration changes must validate inputs and apply correctly to the AI service calls.
System must handle error conditions gracefully with clear user feedback across all features.
